hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'It does not befit us to leave bad examples. The one who takes back his gift is like the one who goes back to his vomit

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ لِخَبَرِ عَبْدِ اللَّهِ بْنِ عَبَّاسٍ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning The Different Reports From 'Abdullah Bin 'Abbas About It
